text: (gentle upbeat music)
Creating serverless applications can feel
unfamiliar when compared to the traditional way.
AWS Serverless Application Model, or SAM,
is an open-source serverless development tool
covering your application through its lifecycle.
SAM transform uses a shorthand syntax optimized
for serverless applications
to generate infrastructure as code.
SAM CLI provides developer workflows,
like build, package, and test, using CloudFormation.
Once you've modeled your application,
SAM CLI helps you build and package it
for all supported Lambda runtimes.
It can also get you started
with pre-built application templates for common use cases.
You can then test your applications locally with SAM CLI,
which also supports AWS CDK and Terraform.
Or you can use SAM Accelerate to test changes directly
in the cloud without waiting for a full deployment.
This effectively shortens the time you need
to find and troubleshoot issues,
ultimately tightening the developer loop.
When you're ready to deploy,
SAM Pipelines create production-ready apps
with many popular CI/CD tools.
Beyond that, SAM is integrated
with many popular authoring, development,
and deployment tools and services you already know and love.
Start building powerful serverless applications today
with AWS SAM.
(gentle upbeat music fades)
